item.description:
Patti Cassidy is organizing this one at the Casino Theatre at the Tennis Hall of Fame in Newport. It's assigned seating, and she bought tickets in H5 and 6, if you want to get seats close to her. Meet up with Patti and everyone, before or after the show to chat and socialize.

 

Questions? Email Patti directly through our site.
item.why: This comedy about Shakespeare's start and whether he wrote his plays is going to be at the Casino Theater in Newport March 3-6. I'd love to go to the matinee (3PM) on the 6th and would love company!
item.name: Let's go to the Beard of Avon in Newport
